QuestData.Title: The Leader Hozen
QuestData.Description: The time has come to face the Ook of Dook. We beat him, and the hozen won't have someone telling them to ravage.$b$bHere is the plan: Yakshoe will lead Tassle in to arena and scare away Chomp Chomp.$b$bThen, you sneak in and fight the Ook of Dook while his hozen are distracted by the yeti rampaging through their home.$b$bWe'll meet you back at Kota Basecamp with a big reward. Good fortune to you, friend of grummles.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enrage Chomp Chomp and then defeat the Ook of Dook.
QuestData.RewardText: The Ook of Dook is dead! Hurray!
